description:
With the blessing from the Goddess of Luck and their beautiful teamwork, Washinomori makes it impossible for Kirino to score. 
Bottom half of the seventh inningï¼Œ Kirino`s hitter almost hits a home run. Kurokan immediately changes the pitcher to Sakamoto and expects strikeouts. 
Sakamoto`s first ball silences the audience. Even the players on the field are shocked. Kenichiro shouts for them to run. When the player on the third base comes to, he runs to home base and scores the team`s first point.
Source: crunchyroll
